altTitles.fr: Après l'hiver, les fleurs de cerisiers...

altTitles.th: ซากุระในสายลมหนาว

description.en:
From living under the same roof to then being classmates?!

Ever since his parents passed away, Haebom has been living in Taesung’s house. And now, being a 12th grader, he enters the same class as Taesung, which makes the whole situation way more awkward. Living together 24/7, Taesung and Haebom's relationship is bound to change.

---
**Original Webtoon:**
* MrBlue: [R15](http://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_blossom_wz), [R19 (Seasons 3-4)](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_blossom19_wz)
* Naver: [Main Story (R15)](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5658511), [Main Story (R19)](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8194120), [Side Stories (R15)](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8197159), [Side Stories (R19)](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8197160)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [INKR (R15)](https://comics.inkr.com/title/34-cherry-blossoms-after-winter?utm=mgd), [INKR (R18)](https://comics.inkr.com/title/1023?utm=mgd), [Pocket Comics (R15)](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/7826), [Tappytoon (Seasons 1-4; R15)](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/cherrybaw]), [Tappytoon (Season 3-4; R18)](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/cherrybaws3m)
* Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语: [R15](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/1741/)
* Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語: [R15](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/900)
* French / Français: [R15](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/les-fleurs-de-cerisiers), [R18](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/adulte-apr%C3%A8s-hiver-fleurs-cerisiers-saison-3)
* Japanese / 日本語: [R15](https://www.comico.jp/comic/900)
* Thai / ภาษาไทย: [R15](https://www.comico.in.th/titles/350)
description.fr:
En Haebom és un noi que va perdre els pares en un accident de trànsit. A conseqüència d'això, acaba creixent a casa d'una amiga de la família que l'acull, i del seu fill Taesung, amb qui la relació no es presenta fàcil tot i la bona amistat que hi tenia abans d'aquell fet inesperat.

---
Ils ont grandi ensemble, mais vivent aujourd’hui comme de parfaits inconnus sous le même toit. Cette dernière année au lycée saura-t-elle les rapprocher ? Alors qu’ils sont aussi opposés que le jour et la nuit, comment combler la distance qui les sépare ? Car après des années de silence, voici que fleurissent les sentiments… Existe en version adulte.

---
**Original Webtoon:**
* MrBlue: [R15](http://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_blossom_wz), [R19 (Seasons 3-4)](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_blossom19_wz)
* Naver: [Main Story (R15)](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5658511), [Main Story (R19)](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8194120), [Side Stories (R15)](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8197159), [Side Stories (R19)](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8197160)

description.th: หลังจากพ่อแม่เสียชีวิตไปด้วยอุบัติเหตุ แฮบมเลยมาอาศัยอยู่ที่บ้านของแทซอง และปีนี้เขาได้เรียนห้องเดียวกับแทซองด้วย ยิ่งทำให้กังวลใจมากขึ้นไปอีก เพราะกลัวแทซองจะรู้ความลับที่เขาพยายามปกปิดไว้ แต่การมาอาศัยอยู่ร่วมชายคาเดียวกันตลอด 24 ชั่วโมงนั้น ทำให้ความสัมพันธ์ของทั้งคู่ต้องเปลี่ยนไป...
description.tr:
Aynı çatı altında yaşadıktan sonra sınıf arkadaşı olmak mı?! Ebeveynlerini kaybettikten sonra, Haebom Taesung'un evinde yaşamaya başlar. Ve şimdi,12. sınıf oluyor, Taesung ile aynı sınıfa düşer, bu da işleri daha da garipleştirir. 7/24 birlikte yaşamalarına bağlı olarak Haebom ve Taesung'un ilişkileri de değişmeye başlar.

---
**Original Webtoon:**
* MrBlue: [R15](http://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_blossom_wz), [R19 (Seasons 3-4)](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_blossom19_wz)
* Naver: [Main Story (R15)](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5658511), [Main Story (R19)](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8194120), [Side Stories (R15)](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8197159), [Side Stories (R19)](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8197160)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [INKR (R15)](https://inkr.com/title/34), [INKR (R18)](https://inkr.com/title/1023), [Pocket Comics (R15)](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/7826), [Tappytoon (Seasons 1-4; R15)](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/cherrybaw]), [Tappytoon (Season 3-4; R18)](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/cherrybaws3m)
* Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语: [R15](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/1741/)
* Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語: [R15](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/900)
* French / Français: [R15](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/les-fleurs-de-cerisiers), [R18](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/adulte-apr%C3%A8s-hiver-fleurs-cerisiers-saison-3)
* Japanese / 日本語: [R15](https://www.comico.jp/comic/900)
* Thai / ภาษาไทย: [R15](https://www.comico.in.th/titles/350)
description.zh: 三月和泰辰幸运地进入同一个职场，可实际工作却不如人意。难伺候的部长，性格不一的同事…甚至还出现了新的情敌？面对充满诱惑的世界与扑朔迷离的未来，他们的选择会是？
